name: Project Volition (demo)
description:
note: we are working on fixing the mac problems. please be patient. ONLY WHEN FLESH MELTS INTO THE MOTHERBOARD WILL WE BE REBORN.

Clara is an Internet shut-in. But when her world is invaded by the web, she must come out and face the code.

Invited by her friends to an abandoned computer company building in their small town, Clara is faced with strange visual hallucinations and whispers of ascension through the cyber. How will she fare in this collision of worlds? And, most importantly, how will she manage her sanity when her best friend becomes a real ghost in a machine? Find out in the demo for PROJECT VOLITION.

Our Team
